attributes.action: Stop the sainsburys development in Whitton high street..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sainsburys supermarket will be taking over vacant buildings in high st Whitton, as much as I dont want to see buildings empty as the co op has left this site partly  derilict over the last 20 years, we do not need another  supermarket, we have a tesco and it is taking away trade from the small shops. 
We petition the Prime minister and Richmond council to bring a hault to the development which will destroy the character of the high street.
